attributes.action: Uk to have a vote on whether we want Scotland to stay in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Labour leader wants them to have a vote and it's sturgeons only policy, so let's vote and send them into the abyss
attributes.background: Tired of the Scots having it all their way in everything, money spent per head of population, they constantly seek independence,  let's make the decision for them as they have already had a vote
